name: Waking Violet
description: Waking Violet is a classic 2D top-down puzzle game, but with awesome spells and a unique time rewind mechanic. Playing as Violet, a shy teen with a desire to grow up, you get trapped in a dream you just can't wake up from.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (2Ghz) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD series 5000 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Additional Notes: Please disable G-Sync to avoid bugs
